alert.note: Alert for Forest; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FOREST AND EAST CENTRAL VILAS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentuck Lake Campground, or 12 miles east of Eagle River, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kentuck Lake Campground around 215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Luna-White Deer Campground, Franklin Lake Campground, Nelma, Anvil Lake Campground, and Alvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
